original_title: ダブル・ミーニング〜Yes or No?
overview: A new female detective joins the special investigations team and dives into some of their hardest cases in this follow-up to the series 'Unfair.' The team investigates a grisly video circulating online that asks viewers to answer 'yes' or 'no' questions with potentially deadly outcomes.
title: Double Meaning: Yes or No?
